item.title: New touchless camera app is now accessible
item.description: Source: Crunchfish. Crunchfish, in partnership with MOMAX, has introduced MOMAX cam, a hands-free camera application for selfie sticks. MOMAX cam allows users to take pictures using gestures, touch, and Bluetooth. Here are some of its key features: Snap photos with a simple V-sign gesture. Use a touchless grab gesture to set the timer for capturing photos from up to 3 meters away. Switch between the front and rear cameras, as well as zoom in and out, using the Bluetooth trigger to get the perfect shot.
